CustomField.description: Used to define the Type of Answer that is expected for this Work Step (e.g. String, Date, Boolean, Picklist , URL). Please note: If "Picklist" is chosen, at least 2 "Work Step Answers" have to be added to this Work Step Template. If "URL" is chose, you have to populate a URL into the field "External URL" on the Work Step Template.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines what type of answer is expected for this Work Step.
CustomField.label: Answer Type
